system.descriptor: The Ability to understand and be aware of one's surroundings. Used for Spotting Items or Individuals or other hidden things. Covers both instantaneous Awareness and more deliberate over-time awareness
system.uses:
Uses: Noticing an Ambush before it happens, searching for clues or hidden items, Eavesdropping on a conversation. (From prior editions: Includes Lip Reading and Search Tests)
Special Use: Lip Reading, Test with -10 per 10 metres from target, Magnoculars or other vision enhancers can benefit, environment can worsen. Success reveals gist of the conversation, more DoS, more details.
system.useTime: Free Action made in Reaction to something
